entry.title: Saturday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Flurries at times heavy beginning near noon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending overnight then mainly cloudy. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
